name: Lord of Arcana
description:
This world is called Horodyn, so named for its first king.
At the edge of a village surrounded by a huge forest lies the powerful stone Arcana, the source of all order in the world. It is said that only one with power can acquire Arcana. Slayers annihilate hordes of monsters, so that they could lay their hands on Arcana. What power does it hold within? And to what destiny is one with Arcana bound?
LORD OF ARCANA™ is an all-new brutal action role-playing game from Square Enix for the PSP® (PlayStation® Portable) system! Dive into a world filled with vibrant visuals and non-stop multiplayer action in this new brutally visceral action RPG game as you destroy monsters designed in collaboration with well-known illustrators who have been successful both abroad and in Japan. With incredible visuals and non-stop action, mixed with great multiplayer co-op and creatures designed by a variety of world-famous illustrators, LORD OF ARCANA™ is not to be missed when it comes to the PSP® system.
